duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as the Owner’s Representative and Construction Manager for transit facilities including operations center and low voltage systems.
Coordinate and supervise construction activities, design, and engineering teams for transit projects.
Provide daily interface and coordination with general contractors and stakeholders during the design and construction phase.
Manage construction staff and provide oversight of the Design-Build contractor to ensure compliance with Transit Owner’s requirements.
Possess proactive and effective management skills, be an excellent communicator, and have collaborative problem-solving skills.
Understand and coordinate agency operations and requirements, including Caltrans experience and local Los Angeles agency coordination.
Travel locally to multiple project sites as necessary and be present at the client project site every day.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Architecture, Engineering, or Construction Management. Possession of a valid Certified Construction Manager (CCM) is preferred.
